ehHeDb7cMFGdX86BYz8iLw.text: There is a reason that Great Links won the burger wars competition.  This place is amazing.  I love when a small business like this can beat out the competition of a major chain.

tm21sYwOA1zypFjcr_FQhw.text: Another great hot dog place; been there a few times. Great selection of hot dogs - chili, Chicago and Vegas dog are my favorites. Coupons in Entertainment Book

8t4ewpNQsjwTbCaYEWAGsw.text: Today was my first time in this great little spot! I loved the laid back atmosphere and the burger was probably the best I've had in Vegas! I decided on just a regular burger with everything on it and chedar cheese fries and the whole table ended up eating my fries. Highly recommended!

leMsO1RSASXcO1a1s79ANw.text: Love this Place! The Quality of the Food and prices are awesome! Love the Chicago all beef hot dog and the burgers are amazing compared to prices at Five Guys.

14JfkGSjvuZKjr7j_Dk2Gg.text: My boyfriend and I "used" to eat at this place all the time, almost on a weekly basis, but after our experience yesterday no more! It's a shame because the food it great, however I've never had such horrible service in my life! We generally always call our order in for pick-up because at lunch time this tiny space is always busy. Yesterday was no exception. We were told the food would be ready to be picked up in 10 to 15 minutes after placing our order. We walk into the shop 15 minutes after placing our order. Not a single employee, server nor cook even acknowledged our presence. After standing at the counter together for 10 minutes and having both servers come behind the counter and completely ignore us while pouring draft beers, we sat down seeing as they were quite busy. Mistake one was not welcoming customers, avoiding eye contact and essentially ignoring us. Another 10 minutes of trying to get someones attention an older gentleman came out from the back (owner?) started to ask us what we needed and then proceeded to cut off my answer as another couple walked in the door. He was much more concerned with this couple for some inexplicable reason. "do you want to be seated/served outside, a place at the counter, wait for table?" Wow, and this guy wouldn't even let me complete a sentence. Rude beyond belief. Mistake two was not letting your customer fishing speaking before cutting them off to address someone else.After another few minutes my boyfriend grabbed some cups so we could at least have a drink while waiting. Now more waiting, I get up to refill my tea and come back to see my boyfriend at the counter with one of the servers. Come to find out our food was bagged and sitting there THE. ENTIRE.TIME. Ice cold greasy slop in a bag. Then the server( LISA) had the nerve to act like it was our fault! Had a complete attitude as she grudgingly offered to have our food remade. After sitting there for 30+ minutes, no thanks, she then turns back to that older guy and almost whines about our unhappiness, that was the third mistake. We didn't even wait for him to say anything but walked out with our ice cold food. On arriving home and unwrapping it we found that they hadn't cut the sandwiches, did not put any napkins in the bag and neglected to give us the fry sauce we requested. I really believe we shouldn't have been charged for the food. At $26.13 for a lunch for two it's not exactly a cheap place. We were there yesterday, May 2nd between 12:45 pm and 1:30 pm.

G8cI3b5-IMONkiMuUnAqrQ.text: I'd NEVER been to a place specialising in hot dogs and wouldn't even think to order a hamburger! My sister saw them win Burger Wars and insisted we try their food. I live in the area and easily ordered my dinner on the phone after reviewing their menu online. I showed up 10 minutes later and was given a free small beverage. Because of the weight, I assumed I'd be dealing with a mess when I got home and amazingly enough everything was wrapped perfectly! We ordered the Ortega Bacon Pepper Jack Burger, the Old West Burger and the award winning Jalapeno Guacamole Cheeseburger. WOW! For the same price as In-N-Out or Five Guys, we had seriously delicious gourmet burger's. We will be back to try everything else on the menu and tell everyone we know about it!

7iJAtxL4RnAEjnHvih0GxQ.text: They mean well, and the service is good, but the food here is just bad. I had a veggie dog with a pile of waxy, unmelted cheddar cheese on top and the cheapest type of grocery store bun. The natural cut fries were soggy, greasy, and a puzzling orange color. It was way overpriced for such poor quality. These reviews are delusional.

4E8bqPGmW8D89tkXtDEkbg.text: Let's get down to the food (even though the UFC was playing - extra points!).  I had a Chicago dog and my wife had a cheeseburger, and we split an order of fries.  Brilliant. And the price was rockin'! Will definitely be back. Staff was very friendly...ie, when the fries were done they brought them out so we could start eating while the dog and burger were still cooking.

yrYAfi2voG1qDbJiUT_5dQ.text: We've been going here for quite a few years now, and we love the food.  Charlie served us tonight and did an excellent job, checking on us regularly and making sure my 4-year old was entertained and had everything she needed.  I'd strongly recommend this place if you're looking for some affordable hot dogs, sausages, burgers, cheese steaks...  It can get crowded, which is a sign of how good the food is, so be patient and you'll enjoy it.

f_mORHnRBgXi1_M7meEebw.text: OK I been here 3 times in 1 week. And they serve BEER! If there's one thing on the Menu you have to try its their Italian Fries (Crinkle CUT) & and Deluxe Chili Cheese Dog. Great now I have to stop in on the way home. This is one of the good one's Yelpers.
